name: Becca
description: Becca is a short point-and-click, interactive story book.

name: Fittest Fire
description: In a ruined world, overrun by evil robots, a disabled cyborg named Blaze rests. Send a spark of energy from your world to Blaze’s to wake him up. Help Blaze take revenge against the robots in this fast paced 2D platformer where you workout to level up.

name: Isle of Maligree
description: Become an investigator in a dark fantasy story. People keep going missing in Maligree, before being forgotten by all who knew them. Will you solve the case before you forget?

name: Penni's Adventure
description: The Lightbearers have invaded, altering your world with technology! Save friends and send bears packing in this family-friendly action platformer!

name: Dungeon Survivors
description: Dungeon Survivors is a top-down fantasy roguelite where you can use your class abilities to fight off a horde of fantasy monsters. Choose from a variety of abilities and items to create unique builds and survive with 1-4 players.

name: TerraCodex: The Stolen Relics
description: In Monte Carlo, powerful relics were stolen from the TerraCodex foundation. The infamous 40 Thieves seem to be behind the heist. As the mastermind behind the investigation, you will manage agents and resources to overcome challenges and catch thieves - each with a particular set of skills.

name: Shadowkin
description: Face waves of enemies as you travel from room to room in your auto-shooting horde survival conquest. You and your companion (AI or 2 Player) must work together and create builds that compliment each other while exploring branching paths through various zones and worlds in a Roguelite setting.

name: Rondo of Darkness: The Curse of Twin Moon
description: Life was ordinary for Morella Vitae, a doctor from the town of Fleur, until she received a letter from a friend asking her to come to Idris and help investigate a strange case.

name: Promenade
description: Go on an adventure in a world packed with secrets helped by your friend, a poulp with many abilities. Explore, solve puzzles, wander across dungeons, blast through races and much more in this game inspired by the best 3D platformers

name: The Hero We Need
description: The Hero We Need is a tower defense with real-time strategy elements with a focus on narrative where players have the power to create their own custom towers by crafting and combining runes.

name: Aveliana
description: Aveliana is an infiltration-action-adventure game in 2.5D with unique and diverse gameplay! Will you stealth your way to victory? Seek a forgotten path on the edge of a cliff? Or stand and fight against your enemies? Follow the trace of a mysterious fox and learn about a surprising story!

name: Seasonal Soccer
description: Seasonal Soccer is single-player soccer game and incredible fun to play. Play against challenging CPU! You can also let AI play your team players and "manager" your team. And take full control when situation goes tricky! Or play all time with 100% control of your players. You have 4 teams to choose: Spain, Switzerland, Finland and Honduras. Easy to play & fun!

name: Mystery of Melody Memorial
description: Mystery of Melody Memorial is a video game for Windows (from XP all the way to 10!) computers and Android devices. This is an adventure title with an imaginative world and an emphasis on storytelling and world-building. However, whereas RPG games would feature turn-based battles, Mystery of Melody Memorial will instead have "song battles". The adventure will be three to four hours long, but elements of replayability grant players the opportunity to discover more than the mainline path could offer. Side-quests allow for more to accomplish, which in turn unlock secrets that would otherwise remain unseen. There will also be an Arcade mode unlockable after beating the main game; the mode will consist entirely of all the major "song battles" from throughout the adventure.The story and character interactions will feature a blend of genuine emotion and genuine humor. The world contains a diverse cast of characters with unique personalities. From eroding in a swamp filled with shady activity to playing at a driving range with a sensei, the journey can be fairly unpredictable. After all, even with music playing a significant role in this lifetime populated by elaborate characters, it's still a dangerous world out there...especially if you don't know where to turn...

name: Beescuit
description: Get ready for a unique experience with Beescuit, an addictive game that combines strategy, fun, and relaxation! Help the bee with the constantly moving conveyors and fit the biscuits perfectly. How many different biscuits can you discover?

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Reloaded Edition
description:
Now with guns! With the Reloaded Edition, the arsenal at your disposal has grown massively. Be creative with your combat or outrun your foes as you enjoy the perks of more than 10 post-launch updates. Good luck out there, and stay human!

It’s been 20 years since the events of the original game. The virus won, and humanity is slowly dying. You play as Aiden Caldwell, a wandering Pilgrim who delivers goods, brings news, and connects the few remaining survivor settlements in barren lands devastated by the zombie virus. However, your true goal is to find your little sister Mia, who you left behind as a kid to escape Dr. Waltz's torturous experiments. Haunted by the past, you eventually make the decision to confront it when you learn that Mia may still be alive in Villedor — the last city standing on Earth.

You quickly find yourself in a settlement torn by conflict. You’ll need to engage in creative and gory combat, so hone your skills to defeat hordes of zombies and make allies. Roam the city, free run across Villedor’s buildings and rooftops in search of loot in remote areas, and be wary of the night. With every sunset, monsters take control of the streets.

name: The Legend Of Tartar
description:
Join Tartar on an Adorable Dream Adventure!

Dangerous monsters have appeared in Tartar's dreams!
Please help Tartar stay undisturbed in its sweet sleep!

Our adventure will become another legend!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Weapon Skin Variants
description: Sin descripción

name: Setsuna ni Kakeru Koi Hanabi
description: Sin descripción

name: Uncutetifying Danny
description: Your cute best friend, Danny, is sick of being called cute, so he needs your help to make him look cool! Your advice is important to him, so he'll change his appearance based on what you say. Will you be able to successfully turn him uncute?

name: Battle Babes: Blood, Sun & Moon
description: Battle Babes is a fast-paced, free-to-play multiplayer turn-based strategy card game. Collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with 6+ powerful hero decks! Experiment with 200+ unique cards each with their own special abilities. Customize your decks and challenge your friends to a fight!

name: VR Skater: SL Pro Series Tour
description: Test your most impressive tricks on championship territory. This pack contains a full tour with 5 brand new maps, inspired by professional street skateboarding championships with smooth concrete terrain. These maps also bring with them exciting new game modes and mechanics.

name: Capitals Quizzer: People Mode
description: Where were they born?

name: Capitals Quizzer: Globe Mode
description: Name countries from their map position.

name: Arcane Array Arena
description: Arcane Array Arena is a shooting auto-battler game that "Combines Offense and Defense". You summon items in a magic circle and shoot them against your opponent! Create your own unique item builds, compose the most powerful deployment, and defeat your opponents!

name: DCS: F-15C Aggressors Air Combat Maneuvering Campaign by Maple Flag
description: The F-15C Aggressors ACM campaign puts you in the cockpit of an F-15C Eagle, as a new Aggressor pilot with the 65th Aggressor Squadron at Nellis Air Force Base. Based on real world procedures you will fly as Red Air against Blue Air Forces.

name: Drums Rock: Twilight Force - 'Twilight Force'
description: Get the track 'Twilight Force' from Twilight Force! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: HammerFall - 'Hearts On Fire'
description: Get the track 'Hearts On Fire' from HammerFall! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Fifth Angel - 'When Angels Kill'
description: Get the track 'When Angels Kill' from Fifth Angel! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: NorthTale - 'Higher'
description: Get the track 'Higher' from NorthTale! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Blind Guardian - 'Blood Of The Elves'
description: Get the track 'Blood Of The Elves' from Blind Guardian! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Battle Beast - 'King for a Day'
description: Get the track 'King for a Day' from Battle Beast! This track is part of the 'Power Metal Music Pack'.

name: Debate
description:
All debates are black and white, there is no middle ground, is there?
Debate is a simple game designed for parties and gatherings of friends, it simply gives you topics to debate and assigns you one side of the argument. You can't choose which side, the app will do it for you!

name: Synthetic Soul: Neon
description: Synthetic Soul: Neon is an immersive modern life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the past and change your future.

name: Hentai Tales: The World Only Maid
description: You wake up and find yourself in a strange room, and a maid next to you wakes you up. You seem to be the master of the house and have countless maids who will do anything you command. Even if it's a little confusing, you decide to enjoy the situation. What will happen?

name: Sex Goddess Punishment
description: This is a vertical flight shooting game. You can get special rewards for beautiful girls in the game.

name: Bodacious Babes: Nightlife
description: The Bodacious Babes are on the town, come meet all the girls. Work your way through over 30 unique puzzle levels to unlock 100+ HOT and SEXY photos of the babes.

name: Escape Simulator: Magic DLC
description: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set in the world of witches and wizards. Grab your equipment in the magic shop and then go onward to the school of magic, where three classes await your mastery.

name: Ride 5: Speed With Style Pack
description: With RIDE 5 - Speed With Style Pack you can experience the joy of riding motorcycles, combining design with exceptional performance, at the spectacular Fuji Speedway!

name: Insider Threat
description: Insider Threat is a first-person survival horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: Thoughtform Invasion
description:
In THOUGHTFORM INVASION you need to try to fall asleep, while being harassed by [REDACTED]. The more you think about them, the more likely they are to materialize.

Use your flashlight to scare them away, close your eyes and get a good nights rest. And brace yourself if you decide to open your eyes.

name: Game-No-Watch Ball
description: A port of the 1980 Game and Watch game Ball - without the watch.

name: 5-fun go ni Igai na Ketsumatsu: Monochrome no Toshokan
description: The game features 100 game-original stories with unique graphics and sounds, described as sometimes fun, other times scary, and occasionally moving. Each story can be completed in five minutes and ends with an unexpected twist. The stories available to read are determined by speaking to the game’s two librarians—the angelic Whi and devilish Lack—allowing you to forge your own story depending on what kind of conversations you have.

name: Animal Parkour
description: The game is an extremely action-packed and challenging adventure game. In this game, players will control cute cartoon characters and embark on an endless journey through beautiful settings on a landscape screen.

name: Rabbitra 2
description: Combined horizontal shooting and endless runner, "Clean" the enemies with "traditional" gameplay style. Try to buy items to help you "clean" more enemies and challenge for higher scores.

name: Starecrown
description: In STARECROWN, a visual-novel merged with a puzzle-based horror experience, your ANGEL whose watched from the distance finally makes himself known. For the worse.

name: Crash Math
description: Crash Math - You must solve math problems while trying to drive a car and avoid traps.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 3
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 2
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Roguelike Chess
description: Roguelike Chess is a turn-based strategy game inspired by chess, in which you control a piece and need to destroy the others, acquiring skills during your turns through the card system. Customize your game with skins from the store and return to the board for a new play.

name: Kneedle Knight
description: Kneedle Knight is a 3rd-person puzzle platformer game. Conjure fabric with a magic needle as Sir Lukoss the Small and merge in and out of fabric. Solve puzzles, platform across magical objects, and defeat cursed candle minions to return Sir Lukoss to normal and defeat the Witch of Fabric!

name: Jolly Rogers Pirates Rumble
description: JRPR in short is an Action Arena fighting game. It is a local multiplayer shared screen game which needs at least 2 players locally to play. Players control different Pirates and compete to win! How do you win? Nice and easy, just push your enemies of the arena or figure out what do with your Pirate powers.

name: Dungeon Walk 2: Konton no Kamigami
description: The world is once again threatened with destruction by a witch who has gained immortality. In a world where only you can repeat loops, loop the present and the past of 1,000 years ago, and challenge a powerful enemy. create your own unique deck and reach deepest part of the dragon labyrinth.

name: Gunvolt Records Cychronicle: Song Pack 1
description:
4 songs previously exclusive to the Azure Striker Gunvolt animated feature will be featured in GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle for the first time!

This song pack for Lumen adds the tracks "Rouge Shimmer", "Parallel World", "Glass Paradise" and "Last Wish"

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Execution Pack 2
description: Terrorize the Victims even more with these new, grisly executions for the Slaughter Family! This pack features one kill each for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, Johnny, and Nancy. Enjoy the hunt!

name: Garden Life: Supporter Pack
description: A radiant garden, elegant teacups and a table bedecked with flowers: the Garden Party Pack includes two exclusive plants and a wide range of stylish items that you can use to bring out the inviting and festive best in your garden!

name: Villain’s Pit
description: You can jump to anywhere you tap! Jump to blocks, avoid traps, dodge bullets, kick bad guys, and escape from the villain's pit.

name: Trolley Path to Gold
description: Puzzle game, build your way to the gold mine by collecting all the tools that come along the way.

name: Pulse Online
description: Players on their own and with the help of other players delve into the mechanics of the game. The development of game content, the discovery of new stars, technologies, and plotlines depends solely on the users' activity. The market is open, prices are determined by the players themselves. Social interaction is the most important and essential aspect in the game Pulse Online. Purchasing in-game goods does not affect the combat balance.

name: Trom
description: Will you be able to guide these 2 robots through intricate puzzles full of traps? It will not be easy to overcome the 42 levels that separate them from freedom.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Cat and Castle
description:
2D action game for cat lovers!
The main character is the cat Moi.

name: For a Vast Future: Colour Palette 8
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Cheerful Puppy Tsubaki
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Red Riding Hood: Wonder Animals Vol.2
description: After saving the enchanted forest, Little Red Riding Hood and her friends confront the evil witch.

name: Hentai Stars: Lonely Kitty Ran
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 8: Arcade Memorial
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Shy Fox Ayame
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Singing Fox Ayame
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Singing Kitty Ran
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Singing Puppy Tsubaki
description: Sin descripción

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Sugar Donut Fair
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Vast Future: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Thunder Ray: Forgotten Duels
description: Thunder Ray is Arcade-Boxing, Retro-like gameplay with blood and violence. Defeat all the best fighters in the galaxy to become the GOAT of the universe.

name: Farmer Simulator Evolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Nanny's Journey
description:
Nanny didn't come to knit!
Get ready to jump, run, grab everything you can in this dynamic platform game. Use a grappling hook to propel yourself through a hellish level to the surface.

name: Seifuku Kanojo: School Girlfriend
description: Seifuku Kanojo: School Girlfriend is love visual novel where you get close with a girl wearing a uniform.

name: LurkBait Twitch Fishing
description: A Twitch powered interactive cozy fishing idle game.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 2
description: Get ready to go gaga as the legendary superstar, Lady Gaga, becomes the Icon for Fortnite Festival Season 2: Unlock Your Talent!

name: Arcade Archives: Jungler
description:
"Jungler " is an action game released by KONAMI in 1981.
Defeat the enemies wandering around the maze-like stage.
If you hit the tail with a shot, the body will become one length shorter.
To defeat an enemy, either erase their entire body with a shot or hit your head against the head of an enemy that is the same length or shorter than you.
If you pick up the "strawberry" in the stage, you can make your body one length longer.

name: Thunder Ray: Origins
description: Sin descripción

name: Pogo Pogo
description: I put together this game to upset a certain kind of individual.

name: Welcome to Ukraine
description: A puzzle game through which you will discover Ukraine.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide3 PC-8801mkIISR
description:
The concluding chapter of the Hydlide series. Can you, as an adventurer, once again save Fairyland? This is the third installment in the iconic Japanese action RPG series, "Hydlide." and the player once again rises to the occasion to save Fairyland from a new crisis.

In addition to the graphics and sound inherited from the previous title as a sequel to the series, this ambitious work incorporates a moderate amount of various elements, such as the ability to choose a class, the concept of time, the need to eat during adventures, and the need to manage luggage due to the weight of items to be carried.

It can be said that this game title not only appealed to fans of the Hydlide series but also left a lasting impression on numerous gaming enthusiasts.

name: Inkidoki And Phoenix
description: Enjoy beautiful pictures, bright and exciting levels, and fun music!

name: Golf Monday
description: Partake in what seems like a normal golf tournament. But watch out! Your competitors will stop at nothing to win.

name: Kunkunkun
description: Go to the abandoned old school alone to investigate the ghost of KUNKUNKUN and be chased, how to become a real MAN? !

name: The Tipping Point
description:
In The Tipping Point, you play as Cass, an arctic climate researcher. You must get off the ice sheet before it collapses. On your way, you will gather and analyze data about the ice.
The Tipping Point is a 3D side-scroller platformer, with about 2-3 hours of gameplay.

Make your way over the collapsing ice sheet by jumping, sliding, and climbing. Reach abandoned research stations and gather data in a series of mini-games. Analyze the data and uncover what is happening to the climate.

The Tipping Point is developed in collaboration with real world researchers in an interdisciplinary effort (physicists, biologists, chemists, statisticians, and more). The things you do in The Tipping Point are based on what researchers do in the arctic in real life.

As researchers do, you will compare the data you collect to previous data sets and investigate changes in the climate.

Solve the mystery of the tipping point and why the ice sheet is suddenly collapsing.

name: Make it! Taiyaki
description: It's time for a taiyaki-making challenge! Can you master this traditional Japanese sweet? Make as many as you can!

name: Who Made this Art? Human or AI
description: Will you be able to distinguish between real art and that created by an artificial intelligence?

name: Breathedge: Cosmic Cluck
description: Join the Man in his space adventure and your virtual reality will become much more real than ever before.

name: Tank vs. Aliens
description: Fight to survive an endless onslaught of aliens, upgrading your tank between levels to keep up with the horde. Death may be inevitable in the aftermath of the invasion, but it is up to you to bring down as many of the these creatures as you can.

name: Garden Life: Eco-friendly Decoration Set
description:
A few daily items, a few innovative ideas and a small gesture for the planet. The Eco-friendly Decoration Set offers new colorful decorations for a “greener” garden!

• Tyre Pots - These colorful tyres found their true purpose of housing the hardiest plants in the garden no matter the wind or weather.

• Eco Lanterns - Crafted from sustainable materials, these lanterns add a touch of eco-elegance to your garden.

• Eco Table and Chair - A furniture set made from repurposed wood.

• Tea Kettle Fairy House - Crafted from recycled metal, it's like giving your garden's fairies a modern, upcycled palace to host their extravagant tea parties!

• Eco Fairy Lights - A charming hideout for your magical garden buddies crafted from upcycled plastic bottles.

name: Garden Life: Garden Party Edition
description: A radiant garden, elegant teacups and a table bedecked with flowers: the Garden Party Edition includes two exclusive plants and a wide range of stylish items that you can use to bring out the inviting and festive best in your garden!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Character EX Pack Cunning
description: This personality pack introduces the new heroine type “Cunning.” ・1 new normal body maid outfit! ・1 new normal body lingerie set! ・1 new normal body hairstyle! ・Over 70 playable yotogi skills! ・2 types of New Yotogi events! ・4 different branches to explore between the 2 New Yotogi events!

name: Japan Train Models: JR Kyushu Edition
description: Japan Train Models third edition features trains from JR Kyushu Japan! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Unheroic Misfits
description: Experience charming, whimsical characters and worlds juxtaposed with themes such as loss and mental illness in this story-driven RPG Maker game where you play as Loo, an insect-like humanoid trying to save their friend before it's too late.

name: To The Death
description: Fast-paced top down shooter. Single player or 2-4 players in local multiplayer / co-op. Sci-fi setting. 3D physics makes the gameplay more dynamic / immersive than traditional 2D shooters. Varied weapons, enemies and interactive environments. All set to a pounding rock / electronica score.

name: Pacific Drive: We Have Liftoff Customization Pack
description: Get ready to blast off with this customization pack for Pacific Drive, including additional items themed around space exploration, that you can use to customize your station wagon.

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Baihe
description:
The 11th character is Baihe the Dragon, a fire-breathing trap zoner who can dominate her space with masterful magic management!

This DLC includes:
• Additional playable character: “Baihe”
• New stage: Smoldering Heaven's Nest
• Baihe Pixel Lobby avatar

Note:
• This product is included in the Season 1 Pass. Be careful not to make

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Nidra
description:
The 10th character to join the TFH roster is Nidra the Tapir, a dream-eating stance character with nightmare mix-ups.

This DLC includes:
• Additional playable character: “Nidra”
• New stage: Slumber Sanctuary
• Nidra Pixel Lobby avatar

Note:
• This product is included in the Season 1 Pass. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
• This item requires the base game (sold separately) to be used.

name: Anamnesia: Part 1 - Am I my Body?
description: Sci-Fi Mystery Visual Novel. Nine people are trapped in an underground research facility, forced to play a game of life and death. Check your log to find the truth that connects those apparent strangers - if you even want to, that is.

name: BattleDrive
description: Survive, Upgrade, Conquer. Race to victory in a relentless arena battle. Drift, unlock new cars, and defeat unique bosses!

name: Alpha League
description: Alpha League is a free-to-play, hero based Auto Chess. In Alpha League, simply pick and build your favorite hero in a Roguelike fashion with 10 different combat genres, and then battle the other 7 Bots or Players to be the winner.

name: Aery: Stone Age
description: In Aery – Stone Age you play as a little flying spirit that watches humanity in its early states evolve. You will discover a long-forgotten land with beautiful environments, and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Quick Quest
description:
Explore a pixelated world steeped in nostalgia with our retro roguelite game. Conquer procedurally generated levels and survive with just one life in this thrilling challenge. Master the jump, attack, and charged attack in a classic platforming view.

What sets our game apart is the epic boss battles. Dive into strategic showdowns, blending the essence of Zelda 2 and Megaman, with the addition of a tactical wall jump for intense boss fights. there are approximately 10 bosses along the run.

As you traverse the procedurally generated levels, you'll regularly discover a variety of equipment in special rooms throughout your run. Equipment come in various types, including swords and helmets, each enhancing or modifying your attack and potentially adding special moves. Be cautious, though, as these can be lost during the run, and the compatibility of certain helmets with specific swords adds an extra layer of strategy.

In addition to traditional weapons, there are throwable items and consumables to aid you in your journey. Use these strategically to gain the upper hand in challenging situations.

Try also more roguie patches that, unlike other equipment, cannot be lost during the run. introducing distinctive functionalities.

Every death means losing your hard-earned equipment, but persevere to unlock permanent feats and new game modes. Get ready to face the challenge and beat your best progress in this nostalgic retro world. Will you manage to complete the run?

name: VR Dinosaur Village
description: This is an exciting VR casual game that allows players to experience the fun of dinosaur breeding in person. In this virtual real world, you will become a dinosaur farmeter to cultivate huge dinosaurs and earn money by planting plants and fishing and feeding dinosaurs.

name: Pro Show Jumping
description: Experience the world of professional show jumping with this simulation-based game! Ride realistic courses with a variety of horses, train your eye for distances, design your own courses and share them with friends.

name: Space Cheese Defenders
description: Space Cheese Defenders is a tower defense game about gathering cheese in space where the towers are capable of deploying and retrieving smaller spacecraft but have limited capacity.

name: Pacific Drive: Deluxe Edition
description: Pacific Drive: Deluxe Edition is a retail exclusive that features the base game, a set of 3 art cards from the heart of the Olympic Exclusion Zone, traveler’s journal, deluxe sleeve, reversible coversheet; as well as a pack of in-game cosmetic items for your station wagon.

name: Towers Watch
description: In a realm where magic and medieval warfare collide, embark on an epic journey to defend the kingdom of Eldoria in "Tower's Watch," a thrilling fantasy medieval tower defense game.

name: Your Shots Count
description: Defeat monsters, protect your village and practice your math skills in Your Shots Count. There's strength in numbers, and you defeat the three different types of enemies by shooting at the correct answer to the math expression above them.

name: Rhythm Life
description: Rhythm Life is a role-playing VR rhythm game where players, on various career paths, use their hands to complete rhythmic challenges and achieve fulfilling lives.

name: Wallkill
description: Need ammo, weapons, or modifiers? Only in this world, come to room 74! But there’s a small problem - we are in a maze... By the way, did the rooms have numbers?

name: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 2
description: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou (also known as Retro Game Challenge in the West) is a remastered version of the DS game, bundled into GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 1 + 2 Replay!

name: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou
description: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou (also known as Retro Game Challenge in the West) is a remastered version of the DS game, bundled into GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 1 + 2 Replay!

name: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 1 + 2 Replay
description: Retro Game Challenge 1 + 2 Replay includes remastered versions of the DS games GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou (released as Retro Game Challenge in the west) and sequel GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 2 (only released in Japan) in celebration of the GameCenter CX TV program’s 20th anniversary. Each game consists of a variety of retro-style minigames.

name: Dwarf Looter
description: Delve into procedural underground, wielding quirky weapons and bizarre hats. Conquer rats, goblins, and demon lords, all while amassing treasures - but your limited inventory space WILL leads to tough choices. Beware your growing greed in this humor-infused fantasy roguelike challenge.

name: LipTrip: My Boss is My Heat Suppressant
description: A boss x employee Omegaverse yuri romance where the physical comes before the emotional.

name: Ruff Ghanor
description: Ruff Ghanor is a Deckbuilder game with Roguelite elements, where each collected card represents a crucial action in your journey. Build the perfect deck, strategize, and create powerful synergies as you progress to face your destiny.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage
description: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage is a deck-building roguelite set in the world of Yohane the Parhelion.

name: Shin-chan: Shiro and the Coal Town
description:
Shin-chan’s pet dog Shiro will be the key character in this game, as it will lead its master to ride a mysterious train that stops in a steampunk-themed coal mine town. The game will then task the player to guide Shin-chan in navigating the town and help its facility owners improve their businesses while carefully monitoring a suspicious group plotting around the town.

Shin-chan will also be able to return to his family who are staying in the village near his father’s hometown during the adventure. He can also do activities like fishing and bug-catching in the village.

name: School Labyrinth
description: School Labyrinth is a co-op horror survival game for max 4 players. You can join your friends and try to escape from the process-generated school maze.

name: Quadroids
description: Quadroids is a mind-twisting pixel-art strategy puzzle platformer that disrupts the genre with a major twist. Players get to clear 100+ hazard-filled interconnected levels by coordinating their minions simultaneously across four screens.

name: Invincible: Guarding the Globe
description: Invincible: Guarding the Globe is a mobile squad idle RPG with an original Invincible storyline.

name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Tyrant's Endgame
description: A casual strategy game that integrates match-three puzzles, rougelike, and deck-building mechanics, set in the world of 'Dungeon No Dungeon'.

name: Mimic Logic
description: "Mimic Logic" is an automatically generated logic puzzle roguelike. Listen to the statements of the treasure chests, find the lying mimics, and open the rest of the treasure chests! Opening a mimic results in a game over.

name: Genotype
description: Your weapons are alive! Print creatures and use them as weapons and tools as you explore this Metroidvania FPS adventure. Morph yourself tiny, upgrade, and locate collectibles to advance to the next boss. Explore large non-linear maps and explore an environment woven together with a complex story.

name: Operation Space Force
description: Join Operation Space Force, a free-to-play team-based shooter that takes place in space. Explore weapon customization and different heroes, explore your base, fight against enemies, and experience different game modes.

name: Grippy Golf
description: Grippy Golf is a speedrunning 3D platformer where objects stick to the ball. Launch yourself across the course, collecting an ever-growing cluster of objects as you aim for a hole in one!

name: Death From Above
description: In Death From Above, you are a lone Ukrainian military drone operator battling Russian occupation forces. Hidden behind enemy lines, you command a 'super drone' to seek and destroy tanks, take back communication towers, recover stolen goods, and fight for a better tomorrow. Slava Ukraini!

name: Regency Solitaire II
description:
Revisit romantic Regency Britain to build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Tour historic hotspots, silence gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree. Play your cards right to unlock bonus levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

Revisit romantic Regency Britain and build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Brought to you by the creators of the hit casual card game, Regency Solitaire.

Play your cards right as you tour must-see locations around Britain, from grand houses to vast landscaped gardens and cultural hotspots.

Resolve a tangled web of family secrets to help Bella silence the gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree.

Unlock gameplay features with your makeover project, and reveal bonus 'Collector's Edition' levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

name: Splatoon 3: Side Order
description:
Challenge yourself to a new single-player campaign, Side Order! As Agent 8, you wake up to discover Inkopolis Square has been drained of color and its residents have gone missing.

Looming over the city is the ominous Spire of Order. Alongside a drone who claims to be Off the Hook member Pearl, Agent 8 must fight off waves of enemies in floor after floor of challenges on their way to the top of the Spire and learn its secrets.

Use color chips to boost your abilities in this experience that’s designed to be replayed over and over.

name: Stranger Things VR
description: Play as Vecna. Become an explorer of unknown realities as you form the hive mind and tame the void. Invade minds and conjure nightmares in your quest to enact revenge on Eleven and Hawkins.

name: CorpoNation: The Sorting Process
description: Greetings, valued employee. You have been tasked with sorting the Ringo CorpoNation's genetic samples. With the credits that you earn, you can shop, game and pay your bills on time. Rogue workers may try to entice you into betraying your beloved employer, but we know you'll give 110%.

name: Pacific Drive
description:
Pacific Drive is a first-person driving survival game with your car as your only companion.
Navigate a surreal reimagining of the Pacific Northwest, and face supernatural dangers as you venture into the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Each excursion into the wilderness brings unique and strange challenges as you restore and upgrade your car from an abandoned garage that acts as your home base. Gather precious resources and investigate what’s been left behind in the Zone; unravel a long-forgotten mystery while learning exactly what it takes to survive in this unpredictable, hostile environment.

name: Moon Rider
description: Moon Rider is a road adventure not only through picturesque landscapes but also within the depths of the human soul. You are a motorcyclist fleeing from your problems. Encounter strangers in visual novels and answer soul-searching questions.

name: Garden Life: A Cozy Simulator
description: Garden Life is a gardening sandbox game in which players can plant, cultivate, decorate, and manage their own garden.

name: Bootstrap Island
description: As the sole survivor of a shipwreck in the 17th century, you must quickly learn to adapt and survive on a mysterious and ruthless island filled with deadly threats and secrets to explore.

name: VSCS-II
description: VSCS-II is a retro-styled narrative game about privacy and security. Using an upgraded '80s operating system, navigate an underground network to make connections, unearth conspiracies, and ultimately decide the fate of the dark web.

name: The Tribe Must Survive
description: The Tribe Must Survive is a tribe-builder with a generous splash of survival and rogue-like. Whatever it takes... The Tribe Must Survive!

name: 502's Arcade
description: 502's Arcade is a collection of fast paced arcade games. Ghost hunting in an procedural dungeon crawler, fast reflex puzzle solving in a potion shop, blasting through alien enemies and more! Get good old arcade fun featuring modern mechanics and challenge your way to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Cafe Maid: Hentai Edition
description: Make your own maid cafe brand the richest in the world. Cute 3D anime girls will help you to get to the top.

name: Sokobond Express
description: A beautifully minimalist puzzle game combining chemical bonds and puzzling pathfinding.

name: Future Fragments
description: Travel to a threatening future and seek the fragments of a powerful weapon to defend your kingdom. Future Fragments is an adults-only, modern take on a platformer with genre-bending gameplay, full english voicework and a branching storyline with choices that actually matter.

name: Perfect World Mobile
description: Perfect World has made its grand return! This new installment restores the beautiful scenery and rich class choices that made the original game famous.

name: Sons of the Forest
description: Sent to find a missing billionaire on a remote island, you find yourself in a cannibal-infested hellscape. Craft, build, and struggle to survive, alone or with friends, in this terrifying new open-world survival horror simulator.

name: Wigged Out
description: Wigged Out is a historically inaccurate party game with a unique take on dodgeball. Two rival schools go head-to-head in a humorous ball game, where the objective is to advance to the opponent's goal line by using every trick in the book.

name: Inkulinati
description: Inkulinati is an ink-based strategy straight from medieval manuscripts, where a rabbit’s bum can be deadlier than a dog's sword. Become a master of the Living Ink, build your own bestiary, defeat medieval superstars and collect perks to unleash hidden powers.

name: Solium Infernum
description: Take the Infernal Throne in this hellish turn-based grand strategy game. The Prince of Darkness has vanished, leaving Archfiends to conspire: muster your legions while intoning dark sorceries, devilish schemes, and machiavellian plots. Who will be the new ruler of Hell and ascend the Throne?

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ambush From Afar
description:
When you command the SU-130PM, you command a vehicle built to unleash hell and relocate before the enemy even knows what hit 'em!

Get this punishing World War II tank destroyer in the Ambush From Afar bundle. It comes with the customizable Klimov 3D Commander and 14 days of Premium Time to increase your earnings in every battle.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier VIII SU-130PM Tank Destroyer
- Klimov 3D Premium Commander
- Premium Time - 14 Days

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo. Premium Commanders start with two open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +15% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Enhanced Gains
description:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ready for Combat
description:
He might not need a tank to fight, but he'll make good use of any vehicle he commands. Customize the Major "Butch" Alan Commander with Skills to optimize your tank's performance! The Ready for Combat bundle also gives you Premium Time, Silver, and boosters to prepare you for the battles ahead.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- Premium Time - 1 Day
- x8 Commander XP Boosters (10)
- x3 Vehicle XP Boosters (10)
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Quick Start
description:
It fires quickly, it moves quickly. If you can't wait to jump into battle, take command of the BT-SV!

This rare World War II light tank is excellent for learning how to play as an active scout. Get it in the Quick Start bundle, and you'll also receive Premium Time to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- Soviet Tier III BT-SV Light Tank
- Premium Time - 3 Days
- 100,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: ColorSweeper
description: A unique and addictive color puzzle game that combines Minesweeper and Nonogram! Like Minesweeper, the player's goal is to fill in all the blanks with the correct color, using the information given on the 8 adjacent squares.

name: Sonic Legacy
description: Sonic Legacy; A re-imagining of the original VS Sonic.EXE mod made by original developers and prominent figures in the Sonic.EXE community, dedicated to the history of Sonic.EXE and other surrounding freaky media, connected characters, and creepypastas.

name: Archery Pro
description: Archery Pro brings life-like, competitive archery straight to your living room through VR! There’s no need for archery equipment to experience the fun of Olympics style Archery with Archery Pro. Simply pop on your headset and experience all the thrills of real-life archery.

name: Bike Unchained 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Top God: Idle Heroes
description: Top God: Idle Heroes is an exhilarating journey through divine realms, where players ascend to godhood with strategic mastery and seamless gameplay. From its stunning visuals to its captivating storyline, every aspect of this game immerses players in a world where they wield unimaginable power.

name: Teatime with a Vampire
description: Teatime with a Vampire is a semi-horror semi-surreal interactive story made in Twine. It was made for the Queer Vampire Jam and Smoochie Jam.

name: Condemned
description: Condemned is a small Heretic episode designed explicitly for ZDoom. There are 6 normal levels, 1 atmospheric interlude level, and 1 secret level.

name: Memories of Glass Maiden
description: An adventure game that lets you enjoy the story and flow of the 'Glass universe,'

name: Myth of Empires: Dongzhou Map
description: Dongzhou is a new map released alongside Myth of Empires V1.0. It features a day/night cycle and a wealth of unique landforms including volcanoes, islands, sandy shores, ice floes, blooming forests, and bamboo forests, giving players a whole new world to explore.

name: Functional: Trees
description: A new section with 13 new levels for the functional game.

name: Marvellous Inc.: MarvGPT
description: Help Marvellous Inc build their own GTP model.

name: Quantum Tripper: Max
description: Response to emotional relishing that is secretively empowered with constant professional creativity.

name: Hues: Sunset Valley
description: 40 more levels with springs!

name: Forza Motorsport: 2015 Cadillac #3 Cadillac Racing ATS-V.R
description: Forza Motorsport 2015 Cadillac #3 Cadillac Racing ATS-V.R

name: VR Harem Sex
description: Immersive harem experience in VR space! High functionality and freedom with lesbian play, cross-sectional views, and more!

name: Undertale Red & Yellow
description: Have you played Undertale Yellow? After completing it, did you think: "Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times..." No? WELL TOO BAD! Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow! An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!

name: Session: Skate Sim Schoolyard
description: Return to the school benches… to pull off your tricks! The new Schoolyard map just might become your new favourite skate playground.

name: Myth of Empires: Musical Instruments Pack
description: This musical instruments pack includes 10 traditional instruments, including the dizi, guqin, se, pan flute, pipa, sheng, suona, xun, konghou, and chime bells. Players can play these as they wish, or even upload custom MIDI tracks to play.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Dystopia Pack
description: Meet 「Dystopia」: the DLC of 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」! This DLC contains 8 new songs.

name: Meteorite Z: The Apocalypse
description: Hardcore top-down zombie shooter, one bite and you are a zombie, you will have allies, manage your team effectively. Use many types of weapons to suppress hordes of zombies. A colorful system for dismembering opponents.

name: Pain is the Best Medicine
description:
Life as a university student is nothing but smooth sailing… until you wake up in the hospital after being hit by a car. You’ve got some broken bones, but it’s not all bad, as your attending nurse turns out to be your favorite childhood babysitter, Lilia.

Unfortunately, she’s too busy to spend much time with you, so you sneak out and follow her. That’s when you stumble onto a dark secret… It seems all the nurses in this hospital are actually sadists! Can you escape with your dignity intact or will you submit to your deepest desires?

name: Pogo-Gogo
description: A game about pogoing up skyscrapers.

name: Prime
description: Prime is a strategic board game that combines elements of chess and checkers, with numbered pieces that move according to specific rules.

name: GeoSlider
description: Dive into our 3D puzzle game, where geography meets fun and learning! Solve time-limited puzzles that start easy and get trickier, offering an original and educational gaming experience. Explore the world in a whole new way!

name: Spider-Guy: Trapped in the Cheese Place
description: take the role of spider guy and escape the cheese place!

name: Demons and Doobins
description: Sneak, Scirm, Doob.... all things you'll do in Demons and Doobins, the 2nd most fun game on Steam. Demons and Doobins is a multiplayer game meant for some stupid fun with friends.

name: Culture Warz: Chess
description: Culture Warz Chess adds a layer of strategy and depth, while the meme-tastic visuals and over-the-top animations keep the tone light and playful.

name: G.O.P.O.T.A 2
description: Don't you keep the kid's word?!

name: Re into Another World
description: "Re into Another World" is an RPG adventure game set in a fantasy world. Players need to accumulate souls by challenging monsters, using these souls to unlock characters in order to defeat the final demon. Character growth and upgrades, equipment combinations, and puzzle-solving included.

name: Just Get There
description: Embark on a creative tower-climbing adventure! Conquer diverse levels, explore, don't fall and Just Get There! Choose leisurely exploration or race against time. Dive into Sandbox for limitless creativity and face dynamic challenges. Balance risk and reward in this exhilarating puzzle platformer!

name: Pim World
description: In the game you will lead your settlement. You will have to build various buildings starting with a castle and ending with an institute. Every decision you make should be balanced, because the economy of your settlement is growing, and the lack of resources can catch up instantly!

name: Death Valley
description: This is a casual game.

name: Recon Quest
description: A top down vehicular shooter, in which the player attempts to accomplish various level goals. There are four specialized vehicles, each one with unique abilities and limitations.

name: Sheep Gather
description: Wander through flower fields, beaches, mountains, and more to find hidden sheep.

name: Idle Champions: Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Dynaheir (if you don't already have them) Baldur's Gate Dynaheir Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Dynaheir 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Dynaheir Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Undead Knight Solaak Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Solaak (if you don't already own them) Undead Knight Solaak Skin An Epic Feat for Solaak 7 Gold Solaak Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Void Islands
description: Are you a prey or predator, a world where magic moves you through the islands of void.

name: Visiting Shrine at Night
description: A horror walking simulator where you just go from left to right through the shrine at night. If you spot something unusual, go back to the left. If there is no problem, please proceed to the right.

name: Click to 13
description: CLICK THE BUTTON. click the button. cLiCk ThE bUtToN. The unofficial sequel, of the unofficial sequel, of click to ten. Explore the intriguing story of how you go from 0 to 1. 1 to 2. 2 to 3. and you know the rest.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Cities & Knights
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Goku's Next Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Tribal Strife Edition
description: “Did everyone forget they took children, -OUR CHILDREN-, and turned them against their own kind? It is not something I can forgive.”

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Deluxe Edition
description:
Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Deluxe Edition includes:

• The base game
• The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion
• The base game's Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
• The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion's Artbook & Soundtrack

name: NBA 2K24: Baller Edition
description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy loads of pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Feel more responsive gameplay and polished visuals while playing with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in PLAY NOW.

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Edition
description: The Shadow of the Erdtree Edition includes the base game and the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Heliborne: Fly High Bundle
description: Get behind the controls of a helicopter or build a weed empire -Weedcraft Inc + Heliborne

name: Suika Game: Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack
description: The popular watermelon game has a new 2-player mode that allows players to play together.

name: Yumpr
description: Yumpr has crashed in hostile enviroment! Filled up with dangerous creatures and obstacles. Help him survive this crazy world!

name: Liquidum
description: Liquidum is a water-themed logic puzzle game, where you strategically fill interconnected aquariums across six challenging sections with unique mechanics.

name: Escape the Glitch
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure within a haunting, fog-laden forest in our latest game. Your mission: collect five scattered bottles hidden in houses across the map, all while avoiding the ominous presence of the glitcher.

name: Last Epoch: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Last Epoch Ultimate Edition is the best way to join the fight, slay your way across Eterra in style, and support the development of the action RPG of the future! Absolutely packed full of rewards, the Last Epoch Ultimate Edition is here to bring you everything you need to get started and look good doing it.

- "Golden Guppy" the Baby Chronowyrm - Pre-Order Exclusive - Cosmetic Pet
- 100 Epoch Points (EP)
- Adolescent Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Fallen Ronin - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Firefly’s Refuge - Cosmetic Portal*
- Temporal Guardian - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Twilight Fox - Cosmetic Pet*
- Adult Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Celestial Way - Cosmetic Portal*
- Full Original Digital Soundtrack (OST)**

Cosmetic items require an online connection and are not available in offline mode.

*These items will unlock and become equipable at 1.0 (February 21st, 2024 - 11am CST)
**This item will be delivered at a later date following the release of patch 1.0

name: Last Epoch: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Last Epoch Deluxe Edition is a fantastic way to join the fight, slay your way across Eterra in style, and support the development of the action RPG of the future!

The Last Epoch Deluxe Edition includes the following cosmetic items:
- "Golden Guppy" the Baby Chronowyrm - Pre-Order Exclusive - Cosmetic Pet
- 50 Epoch Points (EP)
- Adolescent Chronowyrm - Cosmetic Pet*
- Fallen Ronin - Cosmetic Armor Set*
- Firefly’s Refuge - Cosmetic Portal*
- Full Original Digital Soundtrack (OST)**

Cosmetic items require an online connection and are not available in offline mode.

*These items will unlock and become equipable at 1.0 (February 21st, 2024 - 11am CST)
**This item will be delivered at a later date following the release of patch 1.0

name: Turlock Holmes
description: A detective narrative puzzler without pre-set options! Raise your questions at will, and an AI-host will answer only with 'yes' or 'no.' Drive the investigation with your curiosity; the path to solving the mystery lies in questions you ask. Can you dig out the truth through your questions?

name: A Time Traveller's Guide to Past Delicacies
description: A short game about a fictional time traveler raiding the past to steal recipes.

name: Getting Canceled
description: Navigate through everyday office life at the marketing department of a mid-size soft beverage company in this visual novel.

name: Extraordinary: Monster
description: Karena received an urgent mission: to hunt down Professor Selon who killed his wife and children. However, various signs showed that the matter was not a simple murder. Karena followed the clues to the abandoned Alberto laboratory, and the case actually led to a strange crystal Block - ENP

name: DangoVerse
description: Play as your favorite Vtubers from DangoFam! Engage in battles, explore, and clear your way through armies of mobs.

name: Bandle Tale: Bigger-On-The-Inside Pack
description:
The Bandle Tale: Bigger-On-The-Inside Pack includes:
- Poro Closet: Dress up your fluffy little poro pal in two exclusive (and ultra-cute) outfits.
- Stand Behind Poro!
- Buzzy Poro
- Home Sweet Backpack: Two eye-catching exteriors for your bigger-on-the-inside backpack home.
- Honeycomb Hive
- Purple Prism Bungalow
- Strut with Style: Three pathway effects for your character.
Busy Bee
- Zip-Zap!
- Full Speed Ahead
- Secret Menu: Order up! Fresh out of the oven, three additional recipes to add to your cookbook.
- Rainbow Egg
- Almost-Perilous Pie
- Poro Snax

name: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chambers
description: Equipped with cunning and agility, you must navigate through a series of intricate chambers filled with traps, deadly adversaries, hidden chambers and mind-bending puzzles. Your quest? to reclaim the gold that was stolen from you!

name: Into the Depths Below
description: Create your party and explore the depths below Trianis. Endless build options, brutal fight, hardship and exploration await!

name: Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition
description:
Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition includes:

The Standard Edition physical game
All the contents included in the Standard Edition (Guidebook, Control Card, and exclusive skin)
An Exclusive Artbook which also includes a comic (in English)
3 art cards
2 CDs with the Original Sound Tracks of Slave Zero X as well as the original Slave Zero game!
All contents packaged in a collectible tuck-in box

name: Geometry Survivor
description: Geometry Survivor is rogue-lite survival game where you fight waves of enemies in space.

name: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story
description: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story is a crafting RPG set in the whimsical world of Bandle City. After a party goes wrong, the portals that connect your home collapse and throw everything into chaos! Using your knitting magic and backpack house, restore the portals to reunite Bandle City.

name: Hook Adventure
description: Every 200 years the balance support mechanism is destroyed, the crystals that help it work are scattered around the world, and only you can collect them all! Use hook to move between the flying islands and collect all the crystals!

name: Penny's Big Breakaway
description: Join Penny & Yo-Yo in a kinetic 3D-platformer bursting with innovative gameplay! Showcase your catalog of tricks and chain impressive combos to deliver Penny & Yo-Yo's perfect breakout performance. Take the stage with this vibrant pair in Penny’s Big Breakaway.

name: Avenger Sharks
description: Avenger Sharks is a retro twin-stick shooter. Featuring sharks. Out for Vengeance. Save your fishy friends! Destroy the evils of the deep! Collect power-ups, health potions and upgrades! Invoke the sheer fury of fish frenzy or your dinosaur friends to even the odds!

name: BeaureCard
description: Your deck is your health in BeaureCard, an easy to learn fast-paced roguelike deckbuilder. Strive to deplete your opponents' deck, cleverly using traps, powers, blessings, and curses. Embark on an epic adventure, with exciting events to explore, new cards to acquire, and dangerous demons.

name: Feed the Cups
description: Feed the Cups is a game made of drinks. It will make you experience every bit of a drink shop. You will work in various beverage stores: preparing materials, ordering for customers, making drinks, making cups, and so on. You can cooperate with up to 2 people on the screen!

name: La Sombra
description: The cat burglar "La Sombra" infiltrates to into a building to steal the Emerald Tiara But little did she know that the building has been taken by terrorist. Now, with the help of an experimental portable device called Code Breaker, She must decide to finish her hit or face the terrorists

name: Slave Zero X
description: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Nyaaaanvy
description: Physics sumo-wrestling game! A heated battle for dignity among mysterious cat-like creatures. Nyanvy who wins the battle can be a true cat!! Could it be...?

name: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance
description: Terminator: Dark Fate – Defiance is a gritty RTS that puts you in the middle of the Future Wars between humanity and Legion's synthetic intelligent machine network. Take command and lead your army to foil Legion's plan to destroy humanity or play as one of three factions in skirmish and multiplayer.

name: Myth of Empires
description: Myth of Empires is a multiplayer war sandbox game featuring a high degree of freedom. Players must survive, craft, create, and lead troops in their quest to conquer territory and build their own empire.

name: Human Factory
description: Build a factory to store, process and sell Humans. Sell their meat, skin and souls. Become the greatest cosmic space deity in the multiverse.

name: Tetraphobia
description: Tetraphobia is an action roguelite set in a stylized world of floating islands. Utilise different bows to shoot, dash, blast and loot your way through different realms. Filled with unique enemies, bosses, artefacts and NPCs every new run is a new challenge.

name: Last Epoch
description:
Uncover the Past, Reforge the Future.

Ascend into one of 15 mastery classes and explore dangerous dungeons, hunt epic loot, craft legendary weapons, and wield the power of over a hundred transformative skill trees. Last Epoch is being developed by a team of passionate Action RPG enthusiasts.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Find The Truth
description: Find The Truth is a horror RPG puzzle game that revolves around a girl who has lost her memory due to an accident, and her journey to reclaim her lost memories. Your actions in the game will impact the story and lead to different outcomes.

name: Mars Survivor
description: Conquer Mars, fend off alien threats, and secure your path to survival!

name: Vanity Fair: The Pursuit
description: Players follow Lu Yuan through important stages of his life and experience his growth trajectory from youth to maturity. It will take you to relive those decisions that you have never tried to make in reality, and feel the different life brought about by each choice.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Castellan - Garran Crowe
description: A flawless soul entrusted with one of the Grey Knights' most heinous possessions: the Black Blade of Antwyr. Add Garran Crowe to your Strike Force and bring righteous fury against all foes, be they Cultist or Daemonkind.

name: Planetside
description:
Planetside is a small single-level project for Quake!
Explore a research base crawling with unsavory creatures surrounding a mysterious obelisk!

name: Ruins of the Unforgotten Souls
description: Small medieval map for alkaline 1.2.2 with singleplayer, coop and deathmatch support.

name: Star Conflict: Procyon - Deluxe Edition
description: This pack includes:Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer ProcyonWeapon: CoilgunPortrait «Taylor Nelson»Active modules:Photon EmitterMultiphase shieldRepelling BeamWormhole projectorAdditionally, the pilot receives:Permanent 10% bonus to credits gainPattern «Smooth curves»Decor «Risky cargo»Additionally, the pilot receives the modul

name: Voyeur Sex Toons
description: Erotic memory strategy game in which you assume the role of a voyeur, find pairs through the windows, develop your memory and relax watching the landscapes minimalist accompanied by relaxing music.

name: Craving
description: Craving is a pixel art game(poem) about drug addiction, depression an anxiety, with a simple but phisical mechanic which try to represent that suffering. It's just a test of a larger project.

name: Star Conflict: Procyon
description: This pack includes:Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer ProcyonWeapon: CoilgunPortrait «Taylor Nelson»Active modules:Photon EmitterMultiphase shieldRepelling BeamWormhole projector

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - I.A.R. 80-A and 80-B Collector Planes
description: First flown in 1939, the IAR-80 was comparable to other fighter aircraft designs of the late 1930s and would remain in service with the Royal Romanian Air Force throughout World War II until the end of the war in May 1945.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Championship
description: Unleash your inner legend and dominate the dirt with the latest expansion for Mx vs ATV Legends, the official 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Championship.

name: Samurai's Way
description: In "Samurai`s Way," a 2D runner-clicker by TinC Studio, players guide Kenji, a samurai, through ancient world. The game blends swift action with strategic ability use, facing mythical bosses and upgrading skills in a visually striking world. Embrace the samurai spirit in this fast-paced adventure.

name: Robzawar
description: Robzawar is an addictive game that plunges players into the heart of an exciting struggle for survival in an alien world. As the main character, you find yourself in the role of a tough robot whose spaceship has crashed on a treacherous dinosaur planet.

name: Dead Shells
description: What's that behind you? Navigate through the eerie graveyard of this first person atmospheric experience while you aim to be precise, quick, and responsive to defend yourself and survive.

name: Waifu Club: Azumi
description: Waifu Club is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy Azumi in 8 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: Sunny Beach Girls
description: A simple 2048 game with cute girls on the beach!

name: Magic City Detective: Wrath of the Ocean DLC
description: Who says an impending tsunami isn't a good case for a detective? The Siren King didn't think much of the humans, and now that one of them has made his daughter disappear... How will you solve this problem?

name: Magic City Detective: Wrath of the Ocean - Collector's Edition
description: Who says an impending tsunami isn't a good case for a detective? The Siren Lord didn't think much of the humans, and now that one of them has made his daughter disappear... How will you solve this problem?

name: Bond Blues
description: It's 2026, and you're a bail bondsman in Burlington. A fully voiced visual novel exploring the obligations of duty, and what justice really means.

name: Angel Spirit
description: Embark on a mystical journey as an angelic spirit. Navigate through ten unique atmospheric levels on a quest to unlock magical powers.

name: Crystalline Bliss
description: Embark on a journey to serenity within the eternal realms of pure consciousness in Crystalline Bliss. This lo-fi, melancholic, psychedelic voxel puzzle game transports you to the otherworldly landscapes beyond our reality. Delve into the mysteries of your soul and find your path to joy.

name: The Radio Chaser
description: Go recover your radio from the blob thingys on an andventure around multiple locations!

name: Gamebox
description: Gamebox is a free and open source sandbox game centered on user generated content. You decide what you want to play, be it in 3D or 2D, single-player or multiplayer, or create and upload your own games.

name: Black plane
description: This is a maze adventure game.

name: Death tree
description: This is a puzzle game that requires your eyes and hands to work together to score.

name: Ooka Ooka Adventure
description: Ooka Ooka Adventure is an adorable 2 player co-op puzzle platformer! Join the Ookas, Ooka Bing and Ooka Ping, on their journey as they gather the Great Bananas! Take control of Ooka Ping or Ooka Bing, either using gamepads, or with the mouse and keyboard!

name: Spoils of a Starfighter
description: A space survival roguelike where you upgrade your ship over the course of the game, and unlock new ships and weapon mods as you progress over multiple games.

name: Ascent of the Dragon
description: In a world where dragons conquered the world and humanity's last hope is... Ah, who are we kidding. Are you pretending to work? Are you in need of an escape to continue the charade? Then this game is something you need! While your boss thinks you're busy clicking, your dragon does the flicking.

name: Save Twiks
description: “Save Twiks” - psychological horror from the first person. The Kitten named Twiks us lost in a giant train and you will have to go though real horror to find it. “Did you hear this? I think he just meowed in next car”.

name: Radagon Boss FIght
description: A collab work of modders in sekiro modding community, to add the marvelous fight from Elden Ring to Sekiro.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Goku's Next Journey
description: Experience the final episode of the DRAGON BALL Z anime, depicting Goku's long-awaited battle with Uub! How will the battle between Goku and the reincarnation of Majin Buu turn out?

name: The Jusou 3
description: Why was that cursed nest born... A story tracing back even further, 25 years to its very origins. Exploration inside the school is done using a 3D map! Brace yourself and advance through the corridors swirling with terror!

name: The Night Jackals Vol. 1
description: "The Night Jackal" is a captivating game where you experience tension as you discover someone breaking into your phone through your security camera. In this game, you'll confront your fears with contemporary technology invading privacy.

name: Rainbow Six: SMOL
description: Rainbow Six: SMOL is a top-down rogue-lite mobile game that takes players to the cute version of Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six universe. As players progress through fast-paced, procedurally-generated missions filled with destructible environments, smart enemies, terrible traps and challenging objectives, they will free territories, reap benefits and recruit new Operators and Recruits to their cause.

name: Plantabi: Little Garden
description: Plantabi is a chill sandbox game where you take care of adorable plants and design the cozy little garden of your dreams!

name: Chef Life: Cooking Lab
description: Create your own recipes from thousands of combinations with the COOKING LAB pack, available as a free download! Use the lab to offer your customers your own unique cuisine.

name: Tiny House
description: Embark on an adventure to unlock the secrets hidden within an enigmatic mansion with Tiny House.

name: Uninhabited Island
description: join us now!

name: Visca's Earth Conquest
description: A sidescrolling sextroidvania shtomp-em-up where you play as an alien girl with the power to absorb objects and grow larger!

name: World of Shooting
description: A first-person shooting sports sim from the developers of World of Guns. Collect hundreds of realistic firearms and accessories, beat practical shooting and tactical training campaigns, set global high scores, and build your own ranges!

name: Close Cities
description: Close Cities is a relaxing puzzle game in which you will have to build cities in different worlds over time. Find a road and start there. Solve all 160 levels and become a Close Cities legend!

name: Little Red Riding Hood: Wonder Animals
description: What happened after his encounter with the wolf? She meets the new guardian of the forest, facing challenges and mysteries accompanied by her best friends.

name: Quod: Episode 1
description: "Quod" unfolds in a 1930s Texas prison. The main character must escape and uncover the truth. Brace yourself for eerie occurrences and solve intricate puzzles to unveil the terrifying secrets of this place.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Purifier Edition
description: Lead the Grey Knights to exterminate the forces of Chaos in fast-paced, brutal, turn-based tactical combat. Personalise and equip your elite squad of Daemonhunters to purge the deadly corruption of The Bloom as it spreads in a galaxy-spanning campaign.

name: Warhammer Bundle: Chaos Gate & Realms of Ruin
description: Put your strategic skills to the test in the grim darkness of the far future and across the Realms of Ghur with the Warhammer Bundle - Chaos Gate & Realms of Ruin. Includes Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters & Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin.

name: Jet Moto 2
description: A port of Jet Moto 2, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Mortui: Outbreak Secrets
description: For some unknown reason, the zombie virus has taken over the world and zombies are everywhere. The question is; This pandemic is unnatural?

name: Resistance: Retribution
description: Fueled by vengeance, former British Marine James Grayson intends to destroy the Chimeran conversion centers at any cost. Enlisted by the European resistance, The Maquis, he soon learns the Chimera have evolved a new method of converting humans. Set after events in Resistance: Fall of Man, the war for Europe continues….

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenrock
description:
Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenrock" welcomes you to a richly interactive 2D world set in a picturesque mountain resort. The hand-drawn scene in Kittenrock is a labor of love, brimming with intricate details, natural beauty, and humorous Easter eggs, inviting thorough exploration and discovery.

The gameplay blends classic hidden object mechanics with a unique twist—interactive people and cats around the map, enhancing the engagement and depth of the experience. Your primary goal is to spot the skillfully hidden cats that merge seamlessly into the scenic resort surroundings, often revealed through playful interactions with the environment and its inhabitants.

name: KKHTA: Security Watch - Part 3
description: The third KKHTA : Security Watch game.

name: Provenance
description:
Seeing yourself in other people's pictures. Use the right arrow key to advance (or swipe right on mobile).

Originally made for the Bitsyfest jam with the museum theme, but completed much much later.

name: Hopping Bunny
description:
Hopping Bunny,
This rabbit needs to jump and overcome the obstacles that are dangerous for him,
Do you want to help him?
But you need to collect the Keys to pass the level.

When you jump, you can stop time!
This feature will come in handy because sometimes
You will need to maneuver in the air!

name: Cogstellation
description: Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears around. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, colonize the solar system by defeating the existing colonies, and improve your base with the best mining and crafting equipment you can get.

name: Hidden Object Chronicles: Poisoned Truth - Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the tangled web of family dynamics, discovering long-held secrets and uncovering motives hidden beneath the surface!

name: Imperator with nothing to do
description: 'Imperator with nothing to do' is a classic strategy RPG that is very simple, but requires choice and focus. Experience 100% original graphics, sounds, and detailed battles for free!

name: Cats Everywhere
description: Find cats in a relaxing hidden object game for cat´s lovers. Can you find them all?

name: Blast Them All
description: Reload your weapon, the show's about to start! Blast Them All is a wave-based twin stick shooter where you face endless hordes of hungry zombies. Use your agility, pick up weapons and activate traps to defend yourself, build up your strength, collect points and reach the top of the leaderboard!

name: World War: An Age of Industry & Magic
description: A collectible card game with a setting that draws from historical elements of the late 19th and early 20th centuries such as Spiritualism, the Victorian Era, the Industrial Revolution, psuedo-science and quackery of the time like Galvanism, both World Wars, and the sentiment of fin de siècle.

name: Game of Fame and Fortune
description: "Game of Fame and Fortune" is a real-person interactive narrative product. You will become a fledgling young director, looking for the most appropriate decision among various difficult "choices". . Is it "starry" or "begging on the streets". Everything depends on your "means"!

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: Feasts & Friends
description: Come savor the peaceful town of Lilygrove in this cute and cozy cooking game based on the beloved book series Redwall by Brian Jacques. Join Scout-Chef Rootsworth in the kitchen as you challenge hand-crafted recipes, meet a charming cast of characters, forage fresh ingredients, and enjoy a beautiful small-town story. Get ready to prepare a feast for your woodland friends!

name: Ego's Spark
description: Is this a nascent ego—or just a nasty bug? Crash headfirst into cuddles, comfort, and maybe even love in this short visual novel about robots and the human heart.

name: Squirrel Day
description: Squirrel Day is a non-violent VR platforming game that lets you climb, explore, and collect nuts through the eyes of a squirrel using an intuitive, physics-based movement system.

name: Exiled Survivors
description: Dive into the heart-pounding world of Exiled Survivors! Experience relentless action, shape your destiny through strategic choices, and face monstrous foes. Unlock up to 30 characters, conquer bosses, and revel in the perfect blend of Vampire Survivors' intensity and Diablo's depth!

name: Slave Zero X: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Wave Dungeon
description: Wave Danjon is a roguelike RPG in which the player is forced to navigate a map that switches at regular intervals. Conquer dungeons that become more powerful and evil with each wave!

name: Supermarket Simulator
description: Run your own supermarket. Stock shelves, handle cashier tasks, process online orders, design & expand. Set the prices based on the market. The mafia helped you start your venture so be prepared to face the consequences if you fail to make the nightly repayment to the mafia.

name: Invisible Fear
description: Invisible fear is a horror game where you will have to go through a nightmare, surviving during the nights, using your camera that is able to show the non-existent to your eyes...

name: Pullfrog: Deluxe
description: Tetris meets frog! A little puzzle platformer made for Pico-8, equal parts fun and challenging. Help a little frog clear as many lines as possible by using its tongue to pull around blocks in the air.

name: AK-xolotl: Collector's Edition
description:
The cutest, deadliest and UNIQUE Rogue-Lite shooting game, featuring AK-wielding Axolotls. Blast your way through the animal kingdom with an arsenal of impressive firearms, powerful power-ups, and even an army of trigger-happy baby axolotls.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game
- Collector's Box
