- Soundtrack
- Postcard Set
- Key Ring
- Art Book
- Stickers Sheet
- Collectible Pin

name: Beastwatch: Meat & Mayhem
description: Beastwatch is a retro-style horror shooter in which you play a security guard working his first night in a slaughterhouse.

name: The Infirmity
description: The Infirmity is the third-person zombie shooter game that includes the stories of different characters living during the zombie epidemic.

name: Qomp2
description:
An artful reimagining of Pong, qomp2 picks up the story where the delightful indie platform-puzzler qomp left off in 2021.

Control a Pong ball aching to break free of its life stuck between two paddles. Explore a dangerous, minimalist world, armed with simple two button controls: tap a button to change direction by 90 degrees, and hold down a button to unleash a cathartic dash forward. That’s all you need to solve environmental puzzles and labyrinthine levels. Around each corner is a new challenge that will test your two-button and problem-solving skills. A variety of difficult enemies and bosses help you mark your time as you navigate through 30 levels spread across four worlds.

A cerebral puzzler lies within the heart of this indie twist on Pong.

name: Cosmik Battle
description: Cosmik Battle is the next generation Trading Card Game pitting players in exhilarating 1v1 space battles. Pick your spaceship, gather resources, craft your cards, build outrageous decks and reduce your enemies' ships to dust to become the greatest space fighter in the galaxy!

name: Sky Settlers
description: Sky Settlers is a city building card game in which you can build on flying islands using different cards, complete quests and unlock new cards as you progress. But you have to be careful as disaster cards will unleash destruction upon your civilization.

name: Le Mans Ultimate
description: Le Mans is a continually evolving story... powered by emotion, speed and glory. Le Mans Ultimate – the official game of the FIA World Endurance Championship & 24 Hours of Le Mans.

name: Balatro
description: Balatro is a deck-building roguelite where you must play poker hands and earn chips to defeat enemy blinds. Enhance your deck of playing cards, buy Jokers to modify each hand you play, and discover new and wild synergies to win!

name: Diets and Deities
description: Diets and Deities is a rhythm game you can taste! Dodge, Dash and Deflect to the beat of absolute bangers and mash your way through YUMMY recipes you can cook at home!

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall: The Scout - Encore Edition
description: A narrative puzzle-adventure game based on Brian Jacques' Redwall️ book series. Vicious searats are invading the once peaceful Mossflower wood and it's up to the Lilygrove Scout Corps' newest recruit to save the day. Play as Sophia or Liam on their adventure to Redwall Abbey!

name: Kinetic: Break All Limits
description: Fast, fluid, and exhilarating. Jump, dash, bounce, and swing through a world of freedom. There is nothing holding you back. Destroy enemies with your energy blasts as you race to the finish, fight friends online, or free your home planet from an invasive menace in adventure mode!

name: Schmaragon
description: Schmaragon MOBA is an exciting fusion of Eve Online, Dota 2, and Epic's Paragon. It incorporates innovative and hardcore concepts, such as permadeath, variable-powered heroes, no mandatory match completion requirements, and a toxicity-free environment.

name: Middle Evil: The Priest
description: A young priest is coming in a small village where the local church became full of evil. 2d cartoon arcade game with elements of action, top-down shooter and adventure. Use a cross, a sword, a censer and compose words from the holy book to defeat the creatures of the darkness!

name: Empires Shall Fall
description: Empires Shall Fall is a turn based tactics set in a dieselpunk world. Exploit terrain for combat advantage, combine troops, upgrade your army, eradicate your enemies with sheer power and sharp tactics.

name: Stories from the Outbreak
description: Stories from the Outbreak is a turn-based zombie RPG. Lead a group of survivors from the doomed city of Riga towards the ferry sailing across the North Sea. Scavenge for supplies, fight the zombies, decide the fate of your crew. What are you willing to sacrifice to survive the zombie plague?

name: Furnish Master
description: Furnish Master is a relaxing game about furnishing apartments, houses, commercial estate and even outdoor territory! Realize your design dreams! Add to Wishlist now!

name: Lazaret
description: Lazaret is an atmospheric first-person horror game. You play as a member of a rescue team called out to investigate a distress signal coming from a ship that disappeared 4 years ago.

name: Ashen Arrows
description: Ashen Arrows is a Nordic mythology-themed VR archery game featuring roguelike gameplay, tower defense elements, and puzzles.

name: Plane Accident
description: Become an inspector examining causes of plane crashes. Visit the crash site, gather evidence and interrogate witnesses. Explain whether the accident was caused by independent factors or human errors.

name: YonDelver
description: YonDelver is a roguelike bullet-hell hack n' slash. With no stone left unturned on the surface, corporations fight over the rights to massive sinkholes known as "Delves". Team up with players and build up an arsenal before taking on the terrors that sleep deep under the clouds within the delve.

name: Idle Fields
description: Idle Fields is an Idle Farming Game. Plant, Harvest, and Grow crops. Purchase animals, and automate everything with Helpers. Complete all the achievements, ascend to become richer, and unlock it all!

name: Nightingale
description: Nightingale is a shared world survival-crafting game set in a rich gaslamp Victorian fantasy setting. Players venture through portals where adventure and mystery awaits across a myriad of beautiful and increasingly-dangerous worlds.

name: 666 Masks
description: How to survive despair and fear? Stir up your emotions. Look at the world in a new way. Get out of the maze of the catacombs by completing interesting quests. Collect all Masks and become alive again...

name: Dark Gravity
description: Shoot, destroy, collect, craft and destroy even more! "Dark Gravity" is a fast-paced, low poly vertical shoot'em up game that features non-linear campaign mode with lots of enemies and bosses. Craft new weapons, upgrade your fighter and build an ultimate aerial war machine!

name: NBA Now 24
description: NBA Stars Await You in NBA NOW 24! Join the League and Show 'em What You Got!

name: College Sex: Episode 8
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they meet with the assistant professor after hours to talk about an assignment.

name: Chronicles Of Crystal: Turn-Basde Epoch
description: Pixel style RPG world card-like Roguelike,players will live in a mysterious medieval world.The world is full of adventure and challenge,you will embark on a legendary journey through the portal to different levels,randomly challenge a variety of powerful monsters, and engage in intense card battles!

name: My Hot Neighbor Kayla
description: Kayla here !Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry.I'm here to help you relax and brighten up your day with a classic puzzle game!

name: Eternal End
description: This is a space exploration game.

name: Mystic Guardians Slide
description: Enjoy the mystical guardians slide puzzle journey. Get ready for a unique experience

name: Bar
description: Bar is a colorful incremental game with complex gameplay mechanics built around filling the bar. Filling the bar gives you rewards that allow you to fill the bar even faster. Unlock various upgrades to fill the bar at absurd rates.

name: Missman
description: A 2D platformer where a secret agent uses a pistol to propel through obstacles and reach the target.

name: Rhythm Reunion
description: The band is getting back together! Haven't you heard?! 'Summer Vacation' is reuniting for one last gig! Take part in this artistically diverse visual novel as you explore the new lives of each of the old band members, all whilst you convince each of them to return to the lime light!

name: Catch My Color
description: Catch My Color is a game that find objects by applying the appropriate colors to the sights of Korea in black and white. Have fun coloring various landmarks in different colors and discovering hidden elements!

name: Steel Manticore
description: Steel Manticore is a 3D FPS. In the Saraif Republic, the government is on the verge of collapse. Play as a Republican Guard robot pilot to prevent an anti-government uprising. Use main guns, machine guns, rockets, missiles and grenades to defeat your enemies.

name: Super Monsters
description: Are you ready to join the monsters gang and take on the ultimate challenge in Super Monsters Gang Double jump? Join Bob and others and start jumping, dashing, and dodging your way through a monster invasion like never before!

name: Erwartung
description: Immerse yourself in a nocturnal, eerie forest in the virtual reality production of Arnold Schönberg's "Erwartung". The anxiety of a woman who wanders through the forest in search of her lover becomes an intense performance experience through the expressive sound.

name: Legend of Stars
description: Balance ball run our shooting game, including a variety of bullets, magic, characters can be upgraded, clear version of the clearance mode

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Additional Character 2B
description: Set Contents: •Playable character: 2B ;Premium Avatar: 2B; Badge: 2B; Weapon Cutout: Virtuous Contract;Figure Studio poses and expressions 1-6 for 2B,Pod 042, Access Point

name: Table Ball: Emotions Skin Pack
description: Get complete access to the Emotions Skin Pack without spending any pings.

name: Forgiveness
description: Forgiveness is a first-person ambient horror fps game set in the late eighties. After divorcing his wife Emma, Ben moves into the old house where his mother Amanda used to live. While moving in, he realizes that some strange things have been happening in his mother's house.

name: The Belligerence
description: A single player game developed to differentiate itself from existing fighting games. It can be enjoyed with a feeling closest to a real fight. The right stick-based attack and walking parry system provide sensory control. There is a mode to fight cpu and belly hard is incredibly strong

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Society Islands XP: Tahiti & Windward Islands
description: Welcome to Tahiti and the Windward Islands, the eastern part of the Society Islands in the South Pacific. Arrive with an airliner (up to Boeing 747 and Airbus A380) at Faa'a International Airport and go island hopping with a smaller aircraft, or test your skills as a medical air pilot.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Society Islands XP: Tahiti & Windward Islands
description: Welcome to Tahiti and the Windward Islands, the eastern part of the Society Islands in the South Pacific. Arrive with an airliner (up to Boeing 747 and Airbus A380) at Faa'a International Airport and go island hopping with a smaller aircraft, or test your skills as a medical air pilot.

name: Action Fubuki
description: Action Fubuki is a beat'em'up with a fast paced gameplay. You are Fubuki Goro, a kunoichi which use both martial techniques and special techniques to fight. The game is accessible to all as it require only a keyboard and a mouse.

name: World War Next
description: World War Next is a low poly play to earn, multiplayer FPS set during a WW3 conflict, Choose from over 25 countries. Vehicles like tanks, helicopters, boats and armored cars help players get around quickly.

name: Slimes and Beyond Xbox Bundle
description: Slimes and Beyond Xbox Bundle version game bundle.

name: Epigraph
description: Epigraph is a short, challenging, language decipherment puzzle game.

name: Pink Pong
description: Pink Pong is a classic arcade-style game where two players compete in a fast-paced and skillful showdown. Take control of your paddle and go head-to-head with your opponent in a thrilling battle of reflexes and precision. Use your paddle to bounce the ball past your adversary and score points, but be on guard - they're aiming to do the same! The first player to reach the target score wins. Enjoy the timeless simplicity and competitive fun of this classic arcade game brought to the digital age. Pink Pong is perfect for quick matches and high-energy gaming sessions.

name: Buckshot With Friends
description: Tabletop horror game where you take turns firing a shotgun. The game can be played with friends or a dealer, creating an intense, suspense-filled atmosphere. Russian Roulette reimagined.

name: Firefrost
description: Firefrost is a turn-based combat game about snow clearing. Use your flamethrower to burn through the snow, your enemies, and reach soup. Upgrade your flamethrower to unlock new tactical options. If you die, just get up again, no progress lost. Chase the SSoup rank, unlock more upgrades.

name: Doodle Harmony Ghosts
description: Find and match 100 cute doodle pairs scattered all over the screen in this point-and-click game. Can you match them all?

name: First Gen
description: Follow the story of Markus Orwell, a First Generation soldier of the North Alliance while he tries to solve a painful crime and get his life back on track. Navigate through branching paths, multiple endings, where each decision crafts a different journey.

name: Cat's Cafeteria
description: Um jogo de Visual Novel, com histórias interessantes e personagens cativantes.

name: At His Grave
description: Time backtracking secret room decryption game, analyze the character dialogue, find the key to decryption, complete the needs to leave the room. In the end all regret, go back to the past, looking for clues to make up for regret.

name: Abnimality
description: Abnimality is a platformer game with racing elements, explosions and a physical world, where the player uses explosions to control his character, who must jump to the end of the level before the others.

name: Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward
description: Following the success of "Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm," the new game introduces a parallel world filled with fresh characters and meticulously optimized gameplay. The game combines high-quality pixel graphics with a straightforward gameplay style accessible to all players. Key features include a core blocking mechanic, a simple yet deep game system, a live commentary feature, and robust network battle support.

name: Dogs Club
description: Dogs Club is a challenging parkour game that can be played in Singleplayer and Multiplayer. Complete the tracks in the fastest time and take yourself and your country to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Watermelon Suika Game
description: Embark on a puzzle adventure to prevent fruit overflow! Strategically collide fruits, crafting colossal watermelons. Join this exciting challenge of combining matching fruits to conquer the leaderboard and master the art of creating giant watermelons.

name: Xeno Runners
description: Flying dreams? Live the thrill of high-speed aerial racing on a breathtaking alien planet. An adrenaline-fueled experience like no other with challenging time trial races that will push your skills to the limit. Master multiple tracks and unlock new flying machines or simply fly and enjoy the views.

name: Champion Road
description: Champion Road immerses you in a dynamic fusion of classic beat 'em up intensity and entertaining platform challenges. Join six formidable fighters in a nostalgic 90s-style tournament arena. Unleash your skills, relive arcade gaming's golden era, and emerge as the ultimate champion!

name: Gran Carismo
description: "Gran Carismo" immerses players in an intense and competitive racing environment, combining the excitement of illegal underground races with a compelling narrative. Get ready to navigate challenging tracks, outmaneuver rivals, and claim the grand prize – the Rosso 50

name: Nexus Defenders
description: Tower Defense meets a Visual Novel narrative. Place an arsenal of towers to halt the invading enemy. Use special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. A sci-fi space drama, filled with dialogue choices.

name: Please, Touch The Artwork 2
description: A handpainted cozy hidden object adventure. Explore a surreal world. Collect items for its quirky inhabitants. Fix damaged paintings and solve casual puzzles. Help a lost skeleton painter find his way home. This game is short but 100% FREE (no ads, no dlc's).

name: Empyrean Swarm
description: Escape the alien threat! Unleash searing lasers, fire precision phasers, and launch sizzling plasma bolts. Blast, spin, and cut your way through hordes to unlock your ship's potential as you unveil hidden horrors. Challenge the world, arcade-style, and ascend as the galaxy's ultimate pilot!

name: Toytopia
description: Explore the abandon ruins of Toytopia experience the wonders that were once seen at this once amusing attraction. Always check behind your back because something is always lurking near you, meet the varying cast members of Toytopia and try your best to survive.

name: Time to Strike
description: Time to Strike is busted build bullet hell roguelike. Create overpowered builds and break the game by collecting powerful weapons, modifying them with whacky mods and discovering crazy synergies!

name: Jimmy's Agony
description: in time between 1940's to 1960's, we live the Tommy JR Story while he is seeking something he want, is he a good guy? bad guy? it doesn't matter, he will get what he want.

name: Happy Place Remake
description: Happy Place: Explore the wonders of imagination at the new des-located Happy Land. Wonder through the abandon building in search of your old high school friend. Embark on a journey and meet slimo and his friends. Find a weapon, find your friend.

name: Pricolage: Idolized
description:
Who are you...?
Pricolage: Idolized is an SNS-based interactive Visual Novel.

name: Fossilfuel 2
description: Navigate the open-world underground base of the Sierra Research Facility, now flooded, while being relentlessly pursued by towering dinosaurs. With 12 hours of heart-pounding FPS survival horror gameplay and a full cast of prehistoric enemies, can you outwit the dangers and make your escape?

name: Shepherd Dog
description: Shepherd dog havhav starts looking for the sheep that have escaped from the farm to catch them. If he finds it in the fastest time, he writes the name on the leaderboard. Competes with other players.

name: Nidus
description: Emerge into Nidus as a mind-bending Symbiotic Duo. Control Two Characters Simultaneously in challenging Twin-Stick Top-Down Arena gameplay. Gather power, devour the swarm, and shine brilliantly as your strive to complete the mesmerizing collective lifecycle.

name: Gambit Shifter
description: A relaxing puzzle game inspired by chess. Master the board, change your form and create your path to dethrone the opponent King!

name: Tales of the Magic Ball
description: Tales of the Magic Ball is a mix of puzzle game, adventure, roller ball and plattformer. Enter a fantasy world, explore, puzzle, experience a story, fight and overcome obstacles with a physically simulated ball.

name: Omnibullet
description: Build towers, test, repeat. Combining classical tower defense and hardcore puzzle, Omnibullet is a unique experience that will be challenging even for veteran gamers. It doesn’t matter how you do it, just keep the production running!

name: Night Out
description: Night Out is a cooperative online multiplayer action puzzle platformer for 1-4 players. With both a online mode and solo mode, this game will deliver smiles and laughs...

name: Nemire

name: Bombaim
description: This is a simulation of bombing at night during World War II. The white marks passing below are target markers (flares released at lower level by target marking aircraft. You must maneuver your aircraft so that markers are in the centre of your site when the bombs you have released detonate. This involves accounting for your present height (1-6), so that the bombs will explode with the most markers within the blast range (the red area in centre of your targeting site) when the bombs hit the ground. Therefore, at higher heights you must release your bombs sooner, since it takes more time for them to fall, so that they will hit the ground when the target markers are in the centre of your site. If you completely miss (fail to have any markers within the blast area) you lose a point, if you only have one marker in the blast area no points are lost or gained. You must have at least two markers in the area to begin to gain points. A total score is reported at the end of your bomb run.
